tools.name: etcd
tools.description: A distributed, reliable key-value store for the most critical data of a distributed system

tools.name: Consul
tools.description: Consul is a service networking solution to connect and secure services across any runtime platform and public or private cloud

tools.name: Roadrunner
tools.description: RoadRunner is a high-performance PHP application server, load-balancer, and process manager written in Golang.

tools.name: sqlc
tools.description: sqlc generates fully-type safe idiomatic Go code from SQL.

tools.name: livewire
tools.description: Livewire is a full-stack framework for Laravel that makes building dynamic front-ends as simple as writing vanilla PHP.

tools.name: Swoft
tools.description: PHP microservices coroutine framework for building high-performance web systems, APIs, middleware, and basic services.

tools.name: Swoole
tools.description: Enable PHP developers to write high-performance, scalable, concurrent TCP, UDP, Unix socket, HTTP, Websocket services in PHP programming language without too much knowledge about non-blocking I/O programming and low-level Linux kernel.

tools.name: Percy
tools.description: All-in-one visual review platform.

tools.name: Pika
tools.description: Pika is a new kind of package registry for the modern web. 100% ESM. Write once, run natively on every platform.

tools.name: ko
tools.description: ko is a tool for building and deploying Golang applications to Kubernetes.

tools.name: CodeQL
tools.description: CodeQL lets you query code as though it were data. Write a query to find all variants of a vulnerability, eradicating it forever.

tools.name: go-tools
tools.description: honnef.co/go/tools/... is a collection of tools and libraries for working with Go code, including linters and static analysis, most prominently staticcheck.

tools.name: gosec
tools.description: Inspects source code for security problems by scanning the Go AST.

tools.name: go-fuzz
tools.description: Go-fuzz is a coverage-guided fuzzing solution for testing of Go packages. Fuzzing is mainly applicable to packages that parse complex inputs (both text and binary), and is especially useful for hardening of systems that parse inputs from potentially malicious users (e.g. anything accepted over a network).

tools.name: React Adaptive Loading Hooks & Utilities
tools.description: Deliver experiences best suited to a user's device and network constraints.

tools.name: Google Closure Compiler
tools.description: The Closure Compiler is a tool for making JavaScript download and run faster. It is a true compiler for JavaScript. Instead of compiling from a source language to machine code, it compiles from JavaScript to better JavaScript. It parses your JavaScript, analyzes it, removes dead code and rewrites and minimizes what's left. It also checks syntax, variable references, and types, and warns about common JavaScript pitfalls.

tools.name: DNS library in Go
tools.description: Alternative (more granular) approach to a DNS library

tools.name: React
tools.description: React makes it painless to create interactive UIs. Design simple views for each state in your application, and React will efficiently update and render just the right components when your data changes. Declarative views make your code more predictable and easier to debug.

tools.name: Godot
tools.description: Godot provides a huge set of common tools, so you can just focus on making your game without reinventing the wheel.

tools.name: Traefik
tools.description: An open-source reverse proxy and load balancer for HTTP and TCP-based applications that is easy, dynamic, automatic, fast, full-featured, production proven, provides metrics, and integrates with every major cluster technology.
